body_content.explanation: a group of four people meeting for a social activity, such as playing a game or having a meal:
examples: Why don't we invite Caroline and Mark and make up a foursome?

body_content.explanation: a golf match for two pairs of players, in which the players in a pair hit the same ball one after the other until one of them gets it into the hole:
examples: There will be series of foursomes and singles during the tournament.
Foursomes are definitely my favourite form of golf.
